edu.vt.middleware.password
Class PasswordException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          edu.vt.middleware.password.PasswordException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PasswordException
extends java.lang.Exception

PasswordException is used to determine why a password did not meet the requirements of a password rule.
